name: Psycho Ratz Wild Adventures 9
description:
Clarence Hopkins and Hatebreeder IV have finally complete their quest to defeat the mighty CatLord 9000. But now the end credits are over, and there's a burning question on their mind: What do they do now?

Requires two players, two controllers to play. Use psychic powers to navigate your way from the end to the beginning

Credits: 

Alex Rose -  Code, design, sfx.

Gaby Wilde - Art, graphics.

Music by Deeco.
